## BitMatrix.resize() method

Resizes matrix to new size given (width always rounded up to multiples of 32).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resize(m: number, n?: number): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m | <code>number</code> | new number of rows |
|  n | <code>number</code> | new number of cols |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
